docs.title: Welcome to vitm
docs.text: This project aims to recreate the vision-transformers from the hugging face vison models, the project contains many helpful functions, classes and scripts, which could be reused to train your own Vision Transformer.

docs.title: loadData
docs.text:
Loads the CIFAR-10 dataset with PyTorch.

```python from your_module.data_loader import loadData

image_size, num_classes, trainloader = loadData(batch_size=64, resize=224)

docs.title: tests/test_data_loader.py
docs.text:
```python import pytest from your_module.data_loader import loadData

def test_load_data(): image_size, num_classes, loader = loadData(batch_size=8, resize=32) assert isinstance(image_size, tuple) assert num_classes == 10 assert hasattr(loader, 'iter')
